actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to permit Colorado to observe daylight savings time during additional periods in order to improve air quality in urban areas.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to authorize Colorado to extend daylight savings time if the State legislature determines that such action would improve air quality in any urban area within the State.

titles.title: To amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to permit Colorado to observe daylight savings time during additional periods in order to improve air quality in urban areas.
